text: @realDonaldTrump @narendramodi Will you give away our #strategicstockpile of #ventilators and other #PPE to #Russia, your friend, and further harm America’s ability to fight the resurgence of #COVID19? Is that in your #Pandemic #Playbook? 🤡 Or will you protect Americans?
